header.title: Projects & Articles
header.subtitle: A collection of key projects and thought leadership pieces demonstrating practical applications of AI and automation strategy.

items.title: AI Ethics Strategy for Insurance
items.description: A strategic project analyzing the ethical implications of AI in insurance, delivering a roadmap for fair and unbiased automation in claims processing and underwriting using responsible AI principles.

items.title: AI Hackathon: Winning Insurance Assistant
items.description: A hackathon-winning proof-of-concept for a Generative AI assistant, built with Copilot Studio, designed to help insurance agents find complex policy information instantly.

items.title: Automated Invoice Processing Demo
items.description: An interactive demonstration of a Power Automate flow that uses multimodal Generative AI to read and extract structured data from invoices, showcasing advanced BPA capabilities.

items.title: The AI Onboarding Assistant Playbook
items.description: An article detailing the strategy for transforming employee onboarding into a streamlined and efficient experience with a custom AI-powered assistant built on Power Platform.
